data.title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site - Cincinnati OH
data.meta_description: Find AAA approved attractions and other local gems across North America. Learn more about William Howard Taft National Historic Site or other things to do in Cincinnati.
data.text:
AAA Editor Notes

William Howard Taft National Historic Site is at 2038 Auburn Ave. The Greek Revival brick house is the birthplace and boyhood home of the 27th president and 10th chief justice of the United States. Four rooms are furnished to reflect the Taft's family life 1851-77. Other rooms have exhibits depicting the Taft family and the president's devotion to his public career. Tours begin in the Taft Education center next door.

Guided tours are available.
